textBeforeTable: Serving Size 1 Softgel Supplement Facts Omega-3 Glucosamine Product Label: Natrol's Omega-3 Glucosamine is an advanced joint health formula designed to benefit your joints using the latest scientific improvements and a synergistic blend of natural bioactive compounds. Unlike traditional joint care products, Omega-3 Glucosamine provides support for managing joints. It features a unique combination of marine-sourced omega-3 concentrate (with nearly twice the EFA active ingredients as regular fish oil) plus glucosamine, which has been shown to support cartilage tissue. Gluten free. Chondroitin supports cartilage and enhances joint health Glucosamine supports joints and the cartilage that forms them Omega-3 EFAs soothe and comfort joints Omega-3 Glucosamine Product Description: If you are dissatisfied for any reason, we'll give you a full refund and pay return shipping. textAfterTable: *Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. **Daily Value (DV) not established. ***Combined daily value for EPA & DHA. Other ingredients: Gelatin, glycerin, purified water, soybean oil, beeswax yellow, caramel color, carob color and natural lemon oil. Directions: Take 1 softgel, three times daily, with a meal. Consult your healthcare professional prior to use if you have or suspect a medical condition, or are taking prescription drugs. Do not use if you are pregnant or lactating. People with allergies to fish, shellfish or soy should consult their healthcare professional before taking this product. Keep out of reach of children. No yeast, wheat, corn, milk, egg, glutens, artificial colors or flavors, added sugar, starch or preservatives.
